point

public static Location point(Location loc,
                             double bearing,
                             double dis,
                             double earth_radius)
Compute a point which is along a vector a certain distance away

Parameters:
loc - Staring GPS position
bearing - the angle we are facing
dis - the distance (probably in km) we want to travel
earth_radius - the radius of the earth in kilometers
Returns:
the Location we end up at
